title: Guomin Laogong Dai Huijia
alternative_title: How to Steal 55 Kisses, Bringing Back Home Mr. Perfect, Taking Everybody's Husband Home, 国民老公带回家
description: Lu Jin Nian and Qiao An Hao were not married by choice. On the first day of their wedding night, Qiao An Hao made three rules regarding their marriage. One, you are not allowed to touch me. Two, you are not allowed to announce publicly that I'm your wife. Three, you are not allowed to say that we are living together.
